Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Kiddie Tank
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the children's facility inside the Bendine Aquarium.
Room.LongDescription: There are a number of small children playing around a small pool in the center of the room. The pool appears to be filled with playful dolphins and a few very large crabs and crayfish on the bottom of the tank. Occassionally, a few giant sea horses swim by.
